content: A few key achievements from the third quarter include our sixth consecutive quarter of record adjusted net revenue of $419 million, up 51% year-over-year, reflecting record revenue in all three business segments; $44 million of record adjusted EBITDA, up 118% quarter-over-quarter; continued strong performance in member and product additions as well as cross-buy volume; further scaling of SoFi Bank with accelerating growth to surpass $5 billion in deposits, up 86% quarter-over-quarter; and savings of 125 basis points; and cost of funds versus using other sources of debt to fund loans.
